About Me!

Hello There !

Welcome :)

I’m glad that you are curious to know bit more about me.

My Name is Anil, I’m from India.

Currently pursuing PhD from Technological University Dublin, and tinkering with following

  • Computer Vision
  • Internet of Things

Jack of few

I know little bit of following, all thanks to stackoverflow.

  • Python, Matlab, Ionic, Angular
  • Arduino, Raspberry Pi

Research Experience

  • Research Assistant in University of Lincoln, UK
  • Jr Research Assistant in R&D Cell , KSRM College of Engineering

Education

  • Master of Technology from JNTU Anantapuramu, India in KORM College of Engineering
  • Bachelor of Technology from SV University, India in KSRM College of Engineering
  • Diploma from SV Govt Polytechnic, Tirupati , India

Other blogs
